dmca.title: [EV1-C1903575K] DMCA violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

The following web pages appear to be in violation of the DMCA: 
 
www.velocityreviews.com/forums/t254878-guy-macon-couldnt-program-a-wet-d
ream.html
www.velocityreviews.com/forums/t254692-guy-macon-is-a-human-douchebag.ht
ml

x.html

ml 
 
I am sending this email in the hope that you will voluntarily take them
down (they also violate your own  Acceptable Use Policy) and save me the
trouble of pursuing this matter further.

Guy Macon
